Title: #74 How Do We Make Homework Worth the Time?
Description:
Matt Miller @jmattmiller author of the upcoming book "Ditch that Homework" talks about homework. What does the research say? What is the one area that "homework" helps? Can homework be better? Let's talk homework and make sure students are spending their time well.

Enter the book giveaway and read the show notes at www.coolcatteacher.com/e74 about 5 hours after this show goes live on iTunes. Listen to the rest of the shows at www.coolcatteacher.com/podcast
